projects.title: Coin Book
projects.desc: We are trying to put a chip into everything and make them smart - smart phones, smart watches, smart shoes, smart houses. This Table Lamp is an attempt to simplify the complexity of the technology to an extreme, to un-smart, make it stupid, demystify it, expose the everyday quality of technologies in the cosy glow of a table lamp.

projects.title: Table Lamp
projects.desc: We are trying to put a chip into everything and make them smart - smart phones, smart watches, smart shoes, smart houses. This Table Lamp is an attempt to simplify the complexity of the technology to an extreme, to un-smart, make it stupid, demystify it, expose the everyday quality of technologies in the cosy glow of a table lamp.
